name: The Bite Before Christmas
description:
The theme for the Great Ham Jam 2016 was "Things that don't mix." We came up with Santa Claus as a Vampire. Then it just transformed into Santa-pire going to an orphanage to feast on children while avoiding adults and flashlights.

Controls
  • A - Move left
  • D - Move right
  • W - Go up/down stairs
  • F - Bat Mode
  • Spacebar - Feast on children

Credits

  • Character Artist & Animations - Melissa Davidson
  • Environment Artist & UI - Bret Measor
  • Programmer - Thomas Martin
  • Composer - Dan Rodrigues
